detaileddescription.para: If there is no category-specific log level, all logs with a severity level lower than m_log_level will be ignored.

Manages the rate limiting of each log location.

memberdef.name: LogPrintStr

detaileddescription.para: Send a string to the log output
Returns whether logs will be written to any output
Connect a slot to the print signal and return the connection
Start logging (and flush all buffered messages)

Disable logging This offers a slight speedup and slightly smaller memory usage compared to leaving the logging system in its default state. Mostly intended for libbitcoin-kernel apps that don't want any logging. Should be used instead of StartLogging().
Returns a vector of the log categories in alphabetical order.
Returns a string with the log categories in alphabetical order.

briefdescription.para: Returns a string with all user-selectable log levels.
Returns the string representation of a log level.
